transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Shyam ji good evening.
Customer: Ya very good evening. Mai Deepak baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji sir kya abhi hum bike chala rahe hai thoda.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha achcha kab baat kar sakte hai hum?
Customer: Abhi to humko ek dedh ghanta lagega Patna pahunchne mein.
Executive: Achcha kya baat hai bataiye.
Customer: Us din aapne bola tha login karenge fir login nahi kiya fir sir.
Executive: Login kiye the hum dekh liye the actually sir dekhiye IndiaMART pe baithne ke liye koi staff nahi hai. Theek hai na?
Customer: Achcha. Haan. Hum hiring kar rahe hai agar jaise koi ladka aa jata hai employee baithayenge usko.
Executive: Nahi tab tak aap jab tak koi employee nahi baithne ke liye hai system pe tab tak aap IndiaMART app pe login kar sakte hai. Ji hum karte hai app ko karte hai hum kal call karenge aapko. Theek hai Deepak ji.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai, theek hai, theek hai Shyam ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer said he would login but didn't.

- Customer states no staff to manage IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested using the IndiaMART app.

- Customer will call back tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- login, indiamart app, staff
